service_description: Explore our individual service pages for in-depth information on each treatment option. If you have questions or are ready to schedule an appointment, don't hesitate to contact our friendly team. We look forward to becoming your trusted partner in achieving and maintaining a healthy, beautiful smile.

shams_desc: Your beautiful and healthy smile is our priority, and we strive to make quality dental services available to all of you. We have included leading industry specialists in our team, invested in dental offices equipped with innovative technologies, and created a welcoming and cozy atmosphere for all our patients.
copy_right: Â© 2023 Shams Dental Clinic. All rights reserved
suggested_service_desc: The "Shams" dental clinic provides a wide range of dental services.
staff_description: We are proud to have a team of experienced and compassionate dental professionals who are dedicated to providing our patients with the highest quality of care in a warm and friendly environment. Our team is committed to continuing education and staying up-to-date on the latest advancements in dental technology and techniques.
slogon: The formula for your perfect smile is here
new_intro_text:
Dear visitor, "Shams" dental clinic is a modern, high-tech, comfortable, medical center in Armenia, where high-quality, multi-purpose dental services are provided in accordance with European standards. 

 Your beautiful and healthy smile is our priority, and we strive to make quality dental services available to all of you. We have included leading industry specialists in our team, invested in dental offices equipped with innovative technologies, and created a welcoming and cozy atmosphere for all our patients.
new_regards: With respect,Founder and Director of Shams Dental Clinic. Sargis Shamoyan
education_details:
> 2002-  Yerevan State Medical University

 > 2003-2005 -served in the RA Armed Forces

> 2005-2009 Faculty of Dentistry of Yerevan State Medical University, qualification of dentist

> 2009-2010 internship at Yerevan State Medical University

> 2017 residency at Yerevan State Medical University, qualification of  Dental Surgeon
carier_details:
> 2009- MS dental clinic, dentist

> 2010-2017 "Muratsan" hospital complex No. 2 university dental polyclinic, dentis

> 2016 until nowup to now, the founder and director of "Shams" dental clinic

> Actively participated in study abroad programs and professional training in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Georgia, Russia and Armenia.
experience_and_qualification_desc: "Shams" dental clinic employs dentists with many years of clinical, scientific and teaching experience.
individual_approach_desc: Each patient receives an individual approach and care in a comfortable and hospitable environment.
qualified_technologies_desc: Only innovative methods, advanced technological solutions, and quality materials are used in treatment.
